attributes.additional_details: Allow a free vote on the decision of the chancellors budget that will directly affect the ability of the UK to ensure we have a strong and reliable supply of domestic food production in the UK
attributes.background: The rural community has no confidence in the government and wants to call for a debate the issues caused by the chancellor’s recent budget that will damage the food security of the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the petition below relating to inheritance tax: 

Don't change inheritance tax relief for working farms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
